name: Batman: Bad Blood Multiple Choice Quiz | Animated Batman | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which member of the Bat family saved the mob accountant from being tortured in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Batwoman.

	Batwoman made the initial save, though Batman showed up to help her. The troupe of villains included the Electrocutioner, Tusk, Killer Moth and Firefly. They were torturing the accountant for a rival crime gang when the heroes showed up. Batwoman wasn't an official member of the Bat family at the beginning of the adventure. She was acting independently of Batman. Over the course of the movie she became a member of the group.

questions.text: Who took on the mantle of Batman when Bruce Wayne went missing?
questions.explanation:
Dick Grayson.

	Bruce went missing after the fight in the opening scene. The movie is based on the DC Comics New 52 storyline "Battle for the Cowl". Original Robin Dick Grayson put down his own secret identity of Nightwing and took on the Batman cowl because Gotham City needed a Batman, not just a costumed crimefighter.

questions.text: Who caused the accident that fused the black mask to Roman Sionis' face?
questions.explanation:
Damien Wayne/Robin.

	Much like in the comic the movie is based on, Roman Sionis was just a man in a mask. Until that is Damien hit him in the face with an errant flare. The fire fused the mask onto his face and turned him into a madman.

questions.text: Batwoman's reason for becoming a superhero stemmed from her being kidnapped as a child.
questions.explanation:
True.

	During the course of their investigation Dick and Damien found Bruce's files (With Alfred's help) on her. In the video report Bruce had filed, he explained that Katherine's past including when she was kidnapped as a child. Her mother an twin sister were kidnapped with her, and only she survived the assault.

questions.text: Who had hired Heretic to take down Batman?
questions.explanation:
Talia al Ghul.

	Heretic was a new villain in town. No one knew much about him at the outset of the story. Midway through Talia al Ghoul, former lover of Bruce Wayne's and mother to Damien, was revealed to be the person behind his hiring. The Mad Hatter, Jervis Tech, was also in her employ. Talia didn't want to kill Bruce though, only to "reprogram" him to work for her.

Heretic.

	The Heretic followed Batman and Robin back to the Batcave and waited for Damien to be alone. He then hit him with a dart and kidnapped him. It was later revealed that Heretic was a clone of Damien that had been injected with growth hormones.

questions.text: What color was the bat symbol on Batwing's suit?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	The color matched that of Nightwing's black and blue suit. When Luke Fox first put it on the logo was a bright fluorescent blue. It hummed with bright color as the outfit was a suit of armor, much more so than Batman's own costume.

Talia.

	After finding out that Heretic had kidnapped Damien, Talia comforted him briefly and then executed him. She shot him, off camera, while Damien watched. When Damien was upset that she killed him in cold blood, she ordered his memory wiped.

questions.text: Who set Bruce free from his shackles?
questions.explanation:
Damien.

	After managing to free himself during an assault on Talia's palace by his friends, Damien stopped to save his father. Bruce was in a rough state, barely conscious when Damien started to lead him out of the compound. The more they moved around the more Bruce started to recover. Dick, Luke and Katherine had found the compound because there was a tracker hidden on Damien's suit.

questions.text: Who stopped the Mad Hatter from brainwashing an entire room full of world leaders?
questions.explanation:
Alfred (the butler).

	While all of the costumed heroes and villains were fighting each other, Alfred sneaked away to find the Mad Hatter. Alfred attacked the man, stopping him from brainwashing hundreds of world and industrial leaders. The plan had been Talia's to use Mad Hatter's mind control ray to take over the minds of the most powerful people in the world all at once. Alfred, proving he deserved his place among the Bat family, took on the Mad Hatter one-on-one and won.
